text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
It's been some time since I noticed<n>my health starting to
deteriorate.<n>Unfortunately, I haven't sensed much<n>
improvement either.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Manhattan Cafe has been urging me<n>to return home
immediately after our<n>training sessions lately. I thought that<n>
by doing so, I'd be getting all the rest<n>I need...
choice_data_list: (No work today. How about some fresh air!)
(No work today. How about some fresh air!)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Staying cooped up in here can't be<n>good for me either. I
grab the handle<n>of my front door and give it a spirited<n>
twist...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Hello.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I find Manhattan Cafe standing on the<n>other side. Just how
long has she<n>been there?
choice_data_list: Oh, sorry! Did we make plans for today?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No... I just happened to be passing<n>by.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Are you... going somewhere?
choice_data_list: I could use some fresh air.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ... Um... Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I guess... that'd be fine. If we're<n>together...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Yes, I'll come with you.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Since we're together, I begin to think<n>that a more drastic
change of scenery<n>might be nice. What kind of place<n>might
she enjoy?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: This place is actually...
choice_data_list: Oh, were you not a fan of aquariums?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
That's not it... I was just thinking that<n>this place... is a bit
darker than I would<n>have thought...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: We can't become separated... Give<n>me your hand.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Don't even think about... letting go.<n>Now, shall we be off?

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
Hand-in-hand, we stroll about the<n>aquarium. It's rather
busy, likely<n>because today is a holiday. The<n>crowd in front
of the central tank is<n>especially large.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
...It's quite pretty, isn't it? And as<n>long as there are people
around...<n>then...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Ah!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Oh no, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm carried off by the wave of people.<n>Separated from
Manhattan Cafe, I find<n>myself in an empty hallway.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
This area is suffocatingly quiet. Is it a<n>staff-only corridor?
It's also<n>bone-chillingly cold. Do they really<n>keep the air
conditioning that strong in<n>here?
choice_data_list: (I need to get back to Cafe...)

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: I turn around and begin searching for<n>a door, when...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: Snatch!

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I feel as though someone, or<n>something, has grabbed on to
both of<n>my ankles. No matter how much I<n>struggle, I can't
budge an inch.

text_block_list.name: Muffled Voice
text_block_list.text: Play... with... me...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I don't dare to even glance down at<n>my feet. All the while, I
feel like they<n>are being dragged out from under me.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: ...Stop!

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Oh, Trainer... Thank goodness.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Come on, let's get out of here.

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
I'm thankful to be outdoors. The<n>bright warmth offers a
much-needed<n>sense of relief. Just what had<n>happened
back there?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Are you feeling... better?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: That's good. We should be okay... out<n>here.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
I'm sorry... That was careless of me.<n>It's usually fine when
there are so<n>many people around.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It looks like... little can stop itnow.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: I'm afraid... it might come after you<n>again.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: It's... hard to explain.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: There's something else... but it's not<n>like my Friend.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
This one... seems more like a bad<n>memory... or a regret...
It's stuck<n>here... like a scar...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
It's probably better... if we don't talk<n>about it. Our interest
might be... stirring<n>it to act...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Do you actually... believe me?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
In that case... you should be very<n>careful. Try to stay near...
other people.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Please give me... just a little more<n>time...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
The look on her face is one that I've<n>been seeing a lot
lately—entirely<n>serious.
choice_data_list: Too bad about our aquarium trip, though...
Too bad about our aquarium trip, though...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: For now... that's just how it is.<n>Please be patient—
choice_data_list: I really wanted to do something nice for you...
I really wanted to do something nice for you...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Huh?

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text:
For me? But I thought... you were the<n>one who wanted to
go...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Trainer... You...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: You put yourself in harm's way...just for me... That might explainit......

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: No... It's nothing. Trainer...

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Once this is all over... we should come<n>here again...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text:
She walks by my side as we make<n>our way back to the
academy, though<n>she spends most of the time gazing<n>at
the ground.

text_block_list.name: Manhattan Cafe
text_block_list.text: Please don't worry... I can do this...

text_block_list.name: Monólogo
text_block_list.text: She wears an expression of intense<n>determination.
